body: Can someone advise what I'm doing wrong with my solar radiation analysis as the rendering has issues.  Thanks.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/cxNDsYnHlWR2EGPjA9oIAIB4ttyZTrmPds4XZIhx1X3yOpzKG6ceCKnzvr6lQXm4njggr4E5DkwVJ*6o-YF8YK7cVxl-5Ej-/capture3.jpg)
topic: Solar radiation rendering not showing clearly

replies.body:
Set the Preview OFF for the brep you connect to the geometry input.

-A.
